column1: in memory of grace e cavallo -- jaqui-kuhn funeral home| first: last: born: october 16
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:jaqui-kuhn funeral home. highland park
column11: 2015 at the jfk hartwyck at edison estates. born in newark
column12: she lived in edison for many years. she was a communicant at st. john the baptist r. c. church in new brunswick. grace will always be remembered as a loving mother
column13: grandmother and great-grandmother. she was predeceased by her husband
column17: noah cavallo. grace is survived by her daughter
column28: richard walton and a great grand-daughter
column29: marissa blair. relatives and friends may call from 4:00-8:00 p. m. on friday
column30: june 12th at the jaqui-kuhn funeral home
column32: highland park. funeral services will begin at 9:00 a. m. on saturday
column33: june 13th at the jaqui-kuhn funeral home followed by 10:00 a. m. funeral liturgy at st. john the baptist r. c. church
column36: n. j. interment will follow at st. gertrude cemetery
